events.name: Bars Mayhem
events.description: Bars Mayhem is a dynamic hip-hop rap contest where participants will showcase their rap talent with crazy flow and lyrics.

events.name: Rockmania
events.description: Rockmania, the ultimate musical showdown hosted by Advaita, brings together bands from colleges for a spectacular display of talent.

events.name: Beatbrawl
events.description: Beatbrawl is an electrifying beatboxing competition embracing rhythm, creativity, and vocal percussion skills.

events.name: Mridang
events.description: Mridang is a solo instrumental performance event for displaying instrumental talent from various categories.

events.name: Reverb
events.description: Reverb is an enchanting western solo singing competition for vocalists to explore western music.

events.name: Aaroh
events.description: Aaroh is a solo Indian classical singing event to showcase Indian compositions with focus on vocal skill and emotional expression.

events.name: Chandrakala
events.description: Chandrakala is a solo dance competition celebrating classical and folk-dance traditions.

events.name: Nrityakala
events.description: Nrityakala is a group dance competition celebrating the diversity of Indian Classical and Folk dances.

events.name: Groove Wars
events.description: Groove Wars is a group dance competition blending modern western dance styles like hip-hop and jazz.

events.name: Beatblitz
events.description: BeatBlitz is a solo western dance showdown featuring contemporary, hip-hop, and jazz choreography.

events.name: Rhythemic Rebels
events.description: Rhythemic Rebels is a captivating duo dance competition showcasing coordination and dynamic interplay.

events.name: Freestyle Frenzy
events.description: Freestyle Frenzy is a freestyle dance battle featuring raw talent, creativity, and unbounded energy.

events.name: Kala Sangam
events.description: Kala Sangam is a duet fusion dance competition combining two classical/folk dance styles in one performance.

events.name: Isharo Isharo Mein
events.description: Ishaaro Ishaaro Mein is an enthralling mime competition where silence speaks louder than words.

events.name: Improov Leela
events.description: Improv Leela is a spontaneous acting competition where teams engage in on-the-spot battles of wit and humor.

events.name: Aagaaz
events.description: Aagaaz is a Nukkad Natak competition for delivering impactful messages through energetic dialogues and expressive actions.

events.name: Abhinay
events.description: Abhinay is a solo performance event where participants narrate stories through captivating acting.

events.name: Rangmanch
events.description: Rangmanch is about showcasing creative stories and exceptional acting with original or established plays.

events.name: Mandala Art
events.description: Mandala Art is a competition showcasing intricate and mesmerizing mandalas designed by participants.

events.name: Portraits Unplugged
events.description: Portraits Unplugged is a live sketching competition focused on capturing human emotions and character.

events.name: Sketching Competition
events.description: Sketching Competition challenges participants to craft meaningful sketches based on a theme.

events.name: Doodling
events.description: Doodling is a competition where participants create compelling stories through simple doodles.

events.name: Fusion Frames
events.description: Fusion Frames is a mixed medium art competition where participants blend traditional mediums to create unique artwork.

events.name: Supernova
events.description: Supernova is a fashion show where fashion teams compete, showcasing breathtaking designs, stunning models, and spectacular performances.

events.name: Mr and Ms Uphoria
events.description: Mr and Ms Uphoria is a talent and beauty competition promoting youth in dance, singing, mimicking, modelling, and more.

events.name: Bgmi Showdown
events.description: Bgmi Showdown is a thrilling BGMI tournament where teams compete for the championship title.

events.name: Iron Fist Championship
events.description: Iron Fist Championship is a Tekken tournament testing skill, strategy, and precision.

events.name: VPL
events.description: Valorant Premier League is an esports showdown where teams compete for glory and prizes.

events.name: Pro Kickoff Club
events.description: Pro Kickoff Cup is a FIFA gaming competition where players battle for glory in football.

events.name: Cookie Run India
events.description: Cookie Run India is a gaming event inspired by the game Cookie Run, testing players' speed and strategy.

events.name: Echo Strike
events.description: Echo Strike is a team-based battle royale event where squads compete for victory.

events.name: Pitch Perfect
events.description: Pitch Perfect is a virtual cricket gaming tournament where players compete in Real Cricket.

events.name: Popcorn and Playoffs
events.description: Popcorn and Playoffs is a sports and entertainment quiz with team participation and three exciting rounds.

events.name: Just A Minute
events.description: Just A Minute challenges participants to speak on a random topic for a full minute without pausing, repeating, or going off-topic.

events.name: VPL
events.description: Valorant Premier League at the college fest is a competitive gaming event with teams vying for the championship.

events.name: Opinionated 2.0
events.description: Opinionated is a public speaking competition where participants deliver speeches and engage in rebuttal rounds.

events.name: Mehfil-E-Alfaaz
events.description: Mehfil-E-Alfaaz is a poetry competition where participants express emotions through poetry, ghazals, or shayari.

events.name: Pixel Perfect
events.description: Pixel Perfect is a graphic design competition where participants showcase their design skills.

events.name: Dazzled
events.description: Dazzled is a phone photography competition where participants capture campus moments using a specific app.

events.name: Impromptu Frames
events.description: Impromptu Frames is an on-spot photography competition where participants capture unique moments across three days.

events.name: Page to Picture
events.description: Page to Picture is a competition where filmmakers translate written works into visual storytelling.

events.name: StellarVision
events.description: StellarVision 2.0 invites astronomy enthusiasts to present their visionary ideas related to the wonders of the universe.
